info.name: DemoApp Backend API (Role-based)
info.description: Role-based Postman collection grouped by module. Use environment variables for baseUrl and tokens.

request.description:
Method: POST
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/auth/register
Headers:
- Content-Type: application/json
Body:
{
  "email": "patient1@example.com",
  "password": "Password123",
  "fullName": "Patient One",
  "roleId": 3
}
Success Response Example:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "REGISTER_SUCCESS",
  "user": {
    "id": 1,
    "email": "patient1@example.com",
    "fullName": "Patient One",
    "roleId": 3
  }
}
Error Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS"
}

Notes:
- Browser redirect (302) to Google OAuth consent screen

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/auth/oauth/google
Headers: (none)
Body: (none)
Success Response Example:
{
  "message": "Redirect to Google OAuth"
}
Error Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "OAuth authentication failed"
}

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/auth/oauth/failure
Headers: (none)
Body: (none)
Success Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "OAuth authentication failed"
}

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/patients?page=1&limit=10
Headers:
- Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}
Body: (none)
Success Response Example:
{
  "success": true,
  "page": 1,
  "limit": 10,
  "patients": []
}
Error Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Failed to get patients"
}

Notes:
- Returns application/pdf on success

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/prescriptions/{{prescriptionId}}/pdf
Headers:
- Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}
Body: (none)
Success Response Example:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "PDF generated"
}
Error Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Prescription not found"
}

Notes:
- Returns application/pdf on success
- Authorization check inside controller

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/invoices/{{invoiceId}}/pdf
Headers:
- Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}
Body: (none)
Success Response Example:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "PDF generated"
}
Error Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Failed to export PDF"
}

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/doctor-shifts/on-duty?shiftId={{shiftId}}&workDate=2026-02-01
Headers: (none)
Body: (none)
Success Response Example:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": []
}
Error Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Missing shiftId or workDate"
}

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/specialties
Headers: (none)
Body: (none)
Success Response Example:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": []
}
Error Response Example:
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Get specialties failed"
}

Notes:
- Returns application/pdf on success
- Authorization check inside controller

Method: GET
URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/payrolls/{{payrollId}}/pdf

}

URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/reports/revenue/pdf?year=2026&month=1
